00023 PortsEditor::PortsEditor(QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00024                                                  void* dataPointer, 
00025                                                  LibraryInterface* handler,
00026                                                  QWidget *parent):
00027 ItemEditor(component, parent),
00028 addRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00029 removeRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this),
00030 importButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/import.png"), tr("Import CSV-file"), this),
00031 exportButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/export.png"), tr("Export CSV-file"), this),
00032 view_(this), 
00033 model_(dataPointer, this),
00034 handler_(handler) {
00035 
00036         connect(&addRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00037                 &model_, SLOT(onAddRow()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00038         connect(&removeRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00039                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00040         connect(&importButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00041                 this, SLOT(onImport()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00042         connect(&exportButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00043                 this, SLOT(onExport()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00044 
00045         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00046                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00047         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00048                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00049         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00050                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00051         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00052                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00053 
00054         // set view to be sortable
00055         view_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00056         view_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00057         view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::Interactive);
00058         view_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00059         view_.setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00060         view_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00061         view_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::AllEditTriggers);
00062         view_.setWordWrap(true);
00063 
00064         view_.setItemDelegate(new PortsDelegate(this));
00065 
00066         // set proxy to do the sorting automatically
00067         proxy_ = new QSortFilterProxyModel(this);
00068 
00069         // set source model for proxy
00070         proxy_->setSourceModel(&model_);
00071         // set proxy to be the source for the view
00072         view_.setModel(proxy_);
00073 
00074         // sort the view
00075         view_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00076 
00077         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00078         //buttonLayout->addWidget(&detailButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00079         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00080         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00081         buttonLayout->addWidget(&importButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00082         buttonLayout->addWidget(&exportButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00083         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00084 
00085         // create the layout, add widgets to it
00086         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00087         layout->addWidget(&view_);
00088         layout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00089 }

00094 bool PortsEditor::isValid() const {
00095         return model_.isValid();
00096 }

00098 void PortsEditor::onRemove() {
00099         QModelIndex index = proxy_->mapToSource(view_.currentIndex());
00100 
00101         // if index is valid then remove the row
00102         if (index.isValid())
00103                 model_.onRemoveRow(index.row());
00104 }
00105 
00106 void PortsEditor::onImport() {
00107         
00108         QString componentPath = handler_->getPath(*component()->getVlnv());
00109         QFileInfo fileInfo(componentPath);
00110         componentPath = fileInfo.absolutePath();
00111         if (componentPath.isEmpty()) {
00112                 componentPath = QDir::homePath();
00113         }
00114 
00115         QString location = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open file"),
00116                 componentPath, tr("csv-files (*.csv)"));
00117 
00118         // if user clicked cancel
00119         if (location.isEmpty())
00120                 return;
00121 
00122         QFile file(location);
00123 
00124         // if file can not be opened 
00125         if (!file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly | QIODevice::Text)) {
00126                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Error opening file"),
00127                         tr("Could not open file %1 for reading").arg(location));
00128                 return;
00129         }
00130 
00131         // tell model to import the port information
00132         model_.importPorts(file);
00133 
00134         file.close();
00135 }
00136 
00137 void PortsEditor::onExport() {
00138 
00139         QString componentPath = handler_->getPath(*component()->getVlnv());
00140         QFileInfo fileInfo(componentPath);
00141         componentPath = fileInfo.absolutePath();
00142         if (componentPath.isEmpty()) {
00143                 componentPath = QDir::homePath();
00144         }
00145 
00146         QString target = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, 
00147                 tr("Set name and location for csv-file"),
00148                 componentPath, tr("csv-files (*.csv)"));
00149 
00150         // if user clicked cancel
00151         if (target.isEmpty())
00152                 return;
00153 
00154         QFile file(target);
00155 
00156         // if file can not be opened 
00157         if (!file.open(QIODevice::Truncate | QIODevice::WriteOnly)) {
00158                 QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("Error opening file"),
00159                 tr("Could not open file %1 for writing").arg(target));
00160                 return;
00161         }
00162 
00163         // tell model to save the information
00164         model_.exportPorts(file);
00165 
00166         file.close();
00167 }
00168 
00169 void PortsEditor::makeChanges() {
00170         model_.apply();
00171 }
